actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exclude from gross income the first $1,000 of interest received from savings account deposits in home lending institutions.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, the first $1,000 of interest received from savings account deposits in home lending institutions.

titles.title: A bill to exclude from gross income the first $1,000 of interest received from savings account deposits in home lending institutions.
